lore.lore_text: In the frozen realm of Snowcaller, an Age of Ice has buried the warring legacies of humans, elves, and dwarves, their empires reduced to frost and shadow. Humanity's fleeting reign has crumbled as the endless snows empower ancient monsters, dragons, goblins, and worse - that stalk the wastes. You've fought your way to Brighthaven, a fragile bastion of warmth amid the cold, where survival is a blade's edge and fame a fleeting hope. Will you carve a legend from this frozen hell? Or will the ice entomb you with the rest?

Long ago, the village of Eldwood thrived in peace, its fields among the last to bear a harvest. Then the goblins came. Small, vicious creatures led by a cunning chieftain. They raided homes, stole livestock, and plunged the villagers into despair. The elder, a weary man named Thane, once repelled them with a band of brave souls, but age has robbed him of his sword arm. Now, he's called upon the Guild, seeking a new hero to rid the land of this blight.

stages.text: Ah, you must be the adventurer from the Guild. I've seen many winters, but these goblins... they're different. More organized, more dangerous. Will you help us?
Thank the gods! The village will be in your debt. Please, be careful out there.
You've done it! The goblins are gone, and the village can breathe again. You have my deepest gratitude.

lore.lore_text: The kobolds of Blackrock Caves were once mere nuisances, skittering in the shadows. But recently, they've grown bold, snatching supplies from merchant caravans under the cover of night. Some whisper they're driven by a mysterious figure—a hooded stranger seen near the caves. The Guild's contract is clear: stop the thefts, but the truth behind their sudden courage remains buried in the dark.

stages.text: Those damned kobolds! They've been raiding our caravans for weeks. We need someone to put a stop to this.
Good luck. The caves are treacherous, and those kobolds are crafty.
The raids have stopped! You've saved our trade routes. Here's your reward, and my thanks.

lore.lore_text: Bloody savages the orcs are. People for as long as I can remember have been trying to defend them. But they are pure evil. Born of sin and scorn they fight endlessly. When they go on their raids they care not for the goods. Only the humans to hunt.

stages.text: Hello hero. I'm glad to see the guild sent you. After our last quest we feared that no one would come. We believe orcs are coming our way. The orcs are getting smarter, they have started spying on us. We believe there's a nest of them near here. Please head there and put an end to them and find what information you can for us.
Good luck, may the flame be with you.
Hero I thank for your service. After reading this letter I can be sure that we will be in for the fight of our lives. I only pray that when the time comes you will answer our call.

lore.lore_text: Bandits in our frosted wasteland are proof that man without law will eat itself alive. They have no issue killing. Beastfolk often fall victim to their cruelty. We need someone to put an end to them. Please head to the hidden camp and that pack of dogs down.

stages.text: Hello human. I am glad you have taken our request. Over the east along the ridge there is a bandit camp. They have been praying on our kind for far too long. Please find it in your heart to help us.
You will help human? I thank you. The Gods will bless you for your bravery.

The Elder's eyes fill with tears. Thank you human. Not only have you saved our tribe, but you've given a future to our children. Anytime you find yourself lost in the ice our tribe will always have a seat waiting for by the fire.

lore.lore_text: There's word that a great beast is hiding in the woods. The darkness swallows you whole and the beasts feed on you. My dear adventurer, stay safe if you see the darkness build below the ice.

stages.text: Have you heard of the beast in the forest? Legends say the thing swallows people whole and keeps them trapped in a void.
Be careful out there. The darkness comes from the cold.
You've faced the beast and lived to tell the tale! The forest will be safer now.

lore.lore_text: Legends speak of the Dragon of Stormpeak, a beast born from the fury of a shattered sky. Centuries ago, it razed kingdoms, its scales gleaming like molten gold under a storm of fire. Heroes fell, their names lost to ash, until it vanished into the mountains. Now, its roar echoes again, a challenge to the bold. The Guild offers a fortune, but whispers warn: this is no mere beast—it's a force of ancient wrath.

stages.text: The Dragon of Stormpeak has returned. We need a hero brave enough to face it. Are you that hero?
The Guild's resources are at your disposal. Return victorious, or not at all.
You've done the impossible! The dragon is slain, and the realm is safe once more. Your name will be remembered for generations.
